response.overview: A journey of a group of men wanting to throw away the remains of a djinn from their master’s body. They’re instructed by a shaman to throw an earthenware jar containing the djinn into the farthest lake. In the middle of the way, they’re confronted by a forest spirit imparting advice in pantun form. Will they listen to the advice?  An ecological purbawara story about the evil deed of disposing forbidden subtance into public spaces that are detrimental to the locals. Inspired by true story.
response.title: Sisa Binasa
